entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make commenting out code aware of analyzers #66741
  • PublicAPI fixer not working in compiler project #66740
  • Pressing F1 on VB.NET keyword DirectCast goes to the wrong page #66736
  • CSharpMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider #66734
  • Manual code analysis execution does not show in Task Status Center #66733
    17.6
  • Ideas for rename conflict resolution #66730

Closed

  • Project targeting netcoreapp1.0 isn't recognized as netstandard targeting #12458
    Backlog
  • Change CodeLens to use Roslyn preview APIs #13069
    Backlog
  • Extension methods named as properties kill intellisense #17258
    Backlog
  • VisualStudio.SolutionExplorer.AddFile(open: true) doesn't open the file #18488
    Backlog
  • "Add null check" adds unreachable null check #38178
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent error message when attempting to add reference #14020
    Backlog
  • Flaky unit test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.UnitTests.Workspaces.ProjectCacheHostServiceFactoryTests.TestImplicitCacheMonitoring #14592
    Backlog
  • Indent Guides BlockContextProvider starts to cut off text as you indent deeper #15004
    Backlog
  • BasicVenus/CSharpVenus/CSharpVenusRename integration tests fail on Dev15 RC.2 #15844
    Backlog
  • Property gets unindented after pasting text #15865
    Backlog
  • [Failing Test] CSharpFixAllOccurrences.xml #15883
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: Incomplete parenthetical followed by statement is treated as cast #15982
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Make method static or warn if the method can be made static as-is #16621
    Backlog
  • Code Style: Suggest to use identical parameter names across method overrides #16622
    Backlog
  • Discard incorrectly displayed in IDE #16667
    Backlog
  • [Test failure] CrossLanguage.xml #16704
    Backlog
  • Completion doesn't re-use last chosen member if two or more characters is typed #16854
    Backlog
  • Class diagram doesn't show the refness of ref returns #17005
    Backlog
  • Add method brackets when selecting it with the intellisense #17010
    Backlog
  • Setting csharp_style_throw_expression to false doesn't seem to work #17304
    Backlog
  • CS0123 (no overload matches delegate) should offer 'Generate method' quick action #12708
    Next
  • 2 potential perf improvement around code lens #18101
    Backlog
  • IDE display for `var` does not abbreviate #18196
    Backlog
  • Block structure incorrect when using proportional font #18365
    Backlog
  • Roslyn suggests to use C#7 language construct when they aren't valid #18983
    Backlog
  • XML Cref IntelliSense has started showing private types from the framework #19227
    Backlog
  • Introduce parameter should not be offered for literal values in attribute argument lists #66572
    Next
  • Class diagram doesn't show tuple types #17003
    Backlog
  • Razor generated classes show up in solution explorer #18881
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: Select the span automatically based on cursor position for introduce local / constant #752
    Backlog
  • Poor naming suggestions when creating an async method #18926
    Backlog
  • Running a long running "Fix all" results in "Microsoft Visual Studio Is Busy" notification #16135
    Backlog
  • Editor/Codelens bug using C#7 style Tuple #18001
    Backlog
  • Add API to determine what features the runtime supports. #66620
  • "Pick Members" dialog should have a search/filter box. #17649
    Backlog
  • [caret placement] Convert method to property #13492
    Backlog
  • [caret placement] Implement Interface #13491
    Backlog
  • VS2022: Intellisense agressively inserts unneeded/incorrect usings #66735
  • Request: allow analyzer to modify the intellisense completion list #11797
    Backlog
  • Add tests for completion filtering #11700
    Backlog
  • Better handling of ISymbols from SpeculativeSemanticModel #11436
    Backlog
  • C# Automatic String Interpolation Syntax "$" #63077
    Backlog
  • No snippets for autocomplete, only as and is operators #5336
    Backlog
  • params enums don't pre-select IntelliSense #8320
    Backlog
  • Conversions and types in InterpolationSyntax #3924
    Backlog
  • IntelliSence show identifer as a type, but compiler interpret it as a property name #7420
    Backlog
  • Make code previews "smarter" #12233
    Backlog
  • Ability to track issue priorities #10267
    Backlog
  • [Code Style] Have different default dummy variable names in the code preview #10168
    Backlog
  • Generate quick action does not offer to generate local function #9352
    Backlog
  • Completion: preselect based on names #9260
    Backlog
  • Ref returns/locals: Quick Info omits "ref" modifier on properties & locals (needs test) #8453
    Backlog
  • VB Completion List should NOT include "Shared" keyword after "Const" #8291
    Backlog
  • Decouple Formatter.GetFormattedTextChanges from Workspaces to allow using it in an analyzer #8268
    Backlog
  • Infrastructure: IDE Test cleanup #7038
    Backlog
  • Info Bar shows the type name of a code fix or refactoring rather than the friendly name #6826
    Backlog
  • F12 GoToDefinition, when you're on a declaration, should go to the implementation #6544
    Backlog
  • Use the in memory compilation to build in VS #6522
    Backlog
  • Custom event spit for WinRT events is wrong #6312
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't resolve conflicts by wrapping a token in parentheses #6140
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't insert new keyword #6134
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't resolve identical-name conflict by casting to base type #6133
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't resolve same-class conflicts by specifying the classname #6132
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't resolve conflicts by passing default parameter values #6131
    Backlog
  • Rename reports false conflict for equivalent reduced symbols #6124
    Backlog
  • Rename doesn't resolve conflicts by reducing extension method invocations #6123
    Backlog
  • Generate Nested Type Quick Fix shouldn't be offered if the name conflicts #5990
    Backlog
  • Make InlineRenameService.StartInlineSession more asynchronous #5595
    Backlog
  • Improve refactoring error communication #5579
    Backlog
  • Fix results in non-compiling code #5372
    Backlog
  • Enum completion prevention of "Color Color" ambiguity #5373
    Backlog
  • Improve Preview Changes experience #5222
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: Allow renaming classes/methods from the Solution Explorer. #5084
    Backlog
  • Paramref completion has extra items and doesn't show automatically #4917
    Backlog
  • Call Hierarchy should use wait indicator for GTD #4845
    Backlog
  • Remove OrganizingService and dependent files #4109
    Backlog
  • Need to have a way to specify group/order for CodeFixAction provided by CodeFixProvider #3994
    Backlog
  • WorkFlow errors not shown during build results #3821
    Backlog
  • C# smart indenting after single-line comment and a newline #3321
    Backlog
  • Slow performance in ImportAdder + Simplifier + Formatter combination #3024
    Backlog
  • "Place 'System' directives first when sorting usings" should move to the Code Style page #2341
    Backlog
  • Better GFU Insertion Heuristic #456
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update 'Prefer Language/Framework type' to support IntPtr/nint. #66742
    Area-IDE
  • Update 17.5 to GA #66732
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary warning suppression #66743
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix failure to load solution options in RoslynPackage #66738
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove unnecessary calls to OpenFileAsync #66739
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add API to determine what capabilities the runtime supports #66706
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update package version #66729
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce parameter - don't offer for arguments or attribute arguments #66577
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix generate method when existing method is present #66737
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Block instrumentation improvements #66506
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix enum preselection with a params argument #66731
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Fix XmlDocumentationProvider to return the entire XML node #66668
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE
  • Add request concurrency information for processing by the RequestExec… #66727
    Area-IDE
  • Tweak LSIF's MSBuild discovery logic #66709
    Area-IDE
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid compacting TransformNode's state table #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Allow `interface_body` and `enum_body` to consist of just a `;`. #66720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
